item.title: 5'-Sulfated guanosine
item.description: General Description Name Value Level III Discovered 2004 / E. agrestis Synonym Molecular formula C₁₀H₁₃N₅O₈S CAS 32810-44-9 Precursor 1 [M+H]⁺ 364.05631 Precursor 2 Precursor 3 HDX 6 Precursor HDX 1 [d₆-M+D]⁺ 371.10024 Precursor HDX 2 Precursor HDX 3 Rt Rt HDX MS/MS fragments m/z Molecular formula Annotation Recorded MS/MS spectra pdf Precursor Co-eluting Spider Source Author References Title Reference Spider Name Content Link A new approach to natural products discovery exemplified by the identification of sulfated nucleosides in spider venom A.
